:::{#exm-OR}
#### Calculating odds ratios
In @exm-oc-mi, the odds ratio for OC users versus OC-non-users is:

{{< include _def_pi_oc.qmd >}}

$$
\begin{aligned}
\theta(\odds(OC), \odds(\neg OC))
&= \frac{\odds(OC)}{\odds(\neg OC)}\\
&= \frac{`r pi_OC`}{`r pi_nOC`}\\
&= `r pi_OC / pi_nOC`\\
\end{aligned}
$$
:::
